EmailTemplate.name: New Item Issued Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New Item Issued {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi , New Item {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item_Name__c} has been issued to you, Please return on/before Due Date {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Expected_Return_Date__c} Regards LMS Team
